engine
Class Engine

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--engine.Engine
public class Engine
extends java.lang.Object

Engine - this is the main class that will be reacting with the gizmos Engine is static for easy access to all classes and only one instance should be made at any time due to the memory hogging of this class. Search for the keyword "OPTIMIZE" to find locations to optimize in NOTES: May want to specify a time tolerance for collisions that will add more pieces to the collision list

Author:
Ragu Vijaykumar

          MU is the friction in terms of time - measured in s^-1

          MU_2 is the friction in terms of space - measured in L^-1

update

public static void update(double timeSlice)
Will determine everything that happens in the gizmo arena within the next timeslice

Parameters:
timeSlice - - amount of time that will pass before gizmos are to be redrawn
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - - if the amount of time is less than or equal to zero
